div.p: Block and system-level validation of image sensor data (camera) processing subsystems in silicon.

ul.li: Experience with image sensor processing hardware pipelines (e.g. raw image processing, cameras, MIPI).
Knowledge of image formats and color spaces.
Embedded software experience is a must. Device driver experience a plus.
Interest in writing software to validate the correct operation of hardware.

div.p: Work with logic designers to understand the operation of image processing pipelines at the block and system levels. Investigate the use cases, system-level operation, performance requirements Develop low-level software to validate functionality, conformance, and performance of image sensor processing subsystems. Work with other members of the validation team to incorporate your tests into system-level tests. Bring-up and debug devices on new hardware platforms.
BS or MS in EE or CS
